name: Talk Juliet 2
_source: s;Juliet;So, how'd talking with Morrissey go?
s;Simon;I think he wants me to marry his daughter...
s;Juliet;Ha! Can't wait to tell Vincent that one.
s;Juliet;Is this the type of arrangement you can refuse?
s;Simon;I honestly don't know.{w}{br}He's hard to read.
s;Simon;But hey, maybe she's nice and this'll all work out.
s;Juliet;Glad he seems open to negotiation at least?
s;Simon;He just wants to see us train first.
s;Juliet;Feels a bit weird, but sure thing.
